help.servers: Dictionary of all the 'servers' we run

ports.default: List of ports a specific server binds to
ports.string: Single port a specific server binds to

<dict>.file: Data file to watch for changes
<dict>.cmd: Command to execute to get the port data

help.protocols: List of protocols a specific server supports
help.certificate: Certificate file - used for security negotiations
help.private_key: Private key associated with the Certificate
help.routes: JSON file containing the routing table/mapping

check: Backend server check interval. Controls how often
we check routing to a previously assumed down
timeouts.io: Client IO - really timeouts reading from clients

description: Timeout values are all specified in seconds
